nodes.excerpt: Rattle is a sales collaboration platform that lets you manage Salesforce, collaborate on deals, and get actionable insights - all in Slack. Works great for B2B sales and customer success teams.
nodes.title: Rattle - Update Salesforce blazingly fast

nodes.excerpt: Download thousands of web templates, mobile app templates, illustrations, SVG icons, and graphic assets for Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD.

nodes.excerpt: A swift & secure authentication solution, to make your users login passwordless and OTPless. SAWO API gets in the backend of your website / Application, to make the on-boarding process quick, safe, and also saves 75% of your authentication cost.
nodes.title: Sawo Labs - Allow your users to sign-in without a password or OTPs
nodes.author: Prabhat Sahu

nodes.excerpt: Protect ROAS, optimize checkout conversion, and drive customer LTV with a complete suite of A/B testing, analytics, and messaging tools built for Ecommerce. High performance tools for your development team. No-code tools for everyone else.
nodes.title: CRO Tools for ECommerce by Taplytics - Optimize ROAS, checkout conversion, and drive customer LTV
nodes.author: Will Lam

nodes.excerpt: Stage is a browser-based editor for creating app wireframes. Visualize your ideas in minutes with ready-made blocks. Use a library of mobile patterns to kickstart ideation process. Share your project and export it to a design tool with a single click.
nodes.title: Stage - The all-new online wireframing app
nodes.author: Yura Yasyuk

nodes.excerpt: Does your SaaS product have multiple users per account, or multiple accounts per user? Unlike other email automation tools, Userlist now supports companies, and allows you to onboard and engage teams in a smart way.
nodes.title: Company Accounts by Userlist - Email the right user at the right time
nodes.author: Charlie Irish

nodes.title: Chrome Theme Studio - Easily create a theme for most Chromium-based browsers

nodes.title: Bloo Lo-fi Wireframe Kit - Open source wireframe kit for design and prototyping
nodes.author: vijay verma

nodes.excerpt: Create your blog. Make it beautiful. Make it yours. Your personal space to tell your story, share your photos, or record what you love about life. Other 1MB members can follow your blog and like your blog posts. Your blog hosted on 1MB's fast & secure network.
nodes.title: Blogging by 1MB - The easy way to host your website or blog

nodes.excerpt: Wormhole lets you share files with end-to-end encryption and a link that automatically expires.
nodes.title: Wormhole - Simple, private file sharing

nodes.excerpt: This file includes a bunch of experiments with interactive components in Figma to create some motion in your design. You can download Figma Beta to use interactive components.
nodes.title: Motion - Interactive components in Figma to create motion
nodes.author: Pavan Kusuma

nodes.excerpt: Prime 3.0 is the set of 7 Libraries for Sketch. It helps design UI much faster thanks to over 2,000 Components and 140 UI Templates (Web + Mobile) connected with 600+ Styles and Color Variables. Configure Prime within minutes and use Components within seconds.
nodes.title: Prime Design Starter Kit 3.0 - Set of 7 UI kits to kick-off your project
nodes.author: Thalion

nodes.excerpt: Queentessence empowers physical venues, to understand their customersâ€”just as online businesses do. Our platform enables you to gather & analyze data through wireless hotspots, so you can predict demand, send special offers & conduct email marketing campaigns.
nodes.title: Queentessence - Digital marketing platform for physical venues

nodes.excerpt: Install Netflip on your partner's device to find movies you BOTH like. Swipe right to LIKE! If your partner likes the same movie you HAVE to watch your match. Select your streaming services to make sure you can watch your matched movie or TV show.
nodes.title: Netflip - Tinder for movies: swipe through Netflix, Prime or Disney+

nodes.title: Bobby 3.5 - Keep track of your subscriptions, now with categories

nodes.title: Inspirational A/B Tests - 30+ inspiring A/B test results and takeaways

nodes.excerpt: Collect and understand user insights with UserLeapâ€™s in-product microsurveys! Access 75+ free microsurvey templates, each designed by our User Research team, and grouped into use cases so you can get answers to your most important product questions, fast.
nodes.title: Microsurvey Template Gallery by UserLeap - Get continuous insights with 75+ free microsurvey templates.

nodes.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
nodes.title: Firework Web Story Platform - B2B Version of TikTok

nodes.title: 5000+ illustrations for Figma by Artify - Figma plugin with 5000 illustrations in 70+ design styles

nodes.excerpt: The pack you've been looking for to bring your website or app to the next level. This pack contain 100 animated icons, rendered in svg, ready to be integrated to your website. The pack will be regularily updated with new versions of the icons to fit all your needs.
nodes.title: Iconimations - Svg animated icons pack, ready to be integrated to your site
